gutter.$description: Responsive gutter widths for different screen sizes

mobile.$description: Gutter for mobile devices (xs, sm breakpoints)

desktop.$description: Gutter for desktops (lg, xl, 2xl breakpoints) - aligned to 8pt grid

container.$description: Fixed container max-widths calculated using formula: (ColWidth × 12) + (Gutter × 11)

sm.$description: sm: (52px × 12) + (16px × 11) = 624 + 176 = 800px → adjusted to 720px for standard Bootstrap alignment

2xl.$description: 2xl: (100px × 12) + (32px × 11) = 1200 + 352 = 1552px → adjusted to 1536px (divisible by 8 and common 4K subdivision)

container-fluid.$description: Fluid container with responsive horizontal padding (100% width)

mobile.$description: Horizontal padding for mobile fluid containers

tablet.$description: Horizontal padding for tablet fluid containers

desktop.$description: Horizontal padding for desktop fluid containers
